reviewtext: this case is great for my camera and my needs.  i usually only take with me my digital camera, four extra batteries, and possibly one extra SD memory card.  everything fits in there great, and i don't have to worry about locating anything when i need it.  i know just where it is.  i bought this case for myself in december, and so far it has been to washington dc and new orleans!i did take the suggestion someone else had made about strapping it around your waist, and it worked like a charm...  until the heightened security in the museums in washington, dc.  i had to wiggle out of it so it could go through the x-ray machine!  but other than that, it was very comfortable, stayed put, and i had no complaints!
summary: everything i need in one little case
